name: restcalldemo
friendlyName: Demo of a task that calls REST API
description: This task will call REST APIs based on input
author: fgiele

inputs.name: RestEndpoint
inputs.label: REST API Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL at which the Rest API can be reached. Example https://www.example.com/rest

inputs.name: InputValue1
inputs.label: Some input used in the Rest calls
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is one of the many values that can be passed into the task

inputs.name: OptionalValue1
inputs.label: Some optional value
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is one of the many values that can be passed into the task, in this case optional
